verify_message:
Hello and **WELCOME** to the {0} Community!

You're just a few short steps away from being part of a positive, welcoming, encouraging and respectful community for gamers and game lovers of all walks of life.

Please **click on this link** and enter your community details to become part of this fun and amazing tribe!
https://www.globalgamersalliance.com/eastcoastgamers-verification

When you've completed your registration, you will be able to click on the green verify reaction at the bottom of this message to be granted access to the role channel where you can assign yourself any of the desired roles. (We recommend all of them!)
